name: Soul Gazer
description:
This is my submission to the GMTK 2021 Game Jam under the theme "Joined Together"

PITCH

Lock your gaze into an enemy to make a soul connection. This will join your health, and attack pattern. The twist is, the same enemy is still trying to kill you and you share the same hitbox too!

CREDITS

Music - White Bat Audio (Royalty free)

Everything else - CyberPRDX (Me)
